_header: A great lord in a land gan wone
_description: Story of the Wise Son, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
A grett lord in land con woneþat had Afayr chyld to
                    son…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…& ryse apon þe last dayTo com to þat blys
                    þat lastes ay

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
A grete lorde in a lande gon wonneÞat had a faire childe to
                    sonne…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And rise vpon þe last dayAnd wende to blisse þat
                    lastes ay
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
narracio de filio dimitis sancto monacho inuita patre qui videbat
                        iuuenes mori sicut & senes (p. 364)

CULDd11.First Lines:
A Gret lord in a land gan woneþat had a fayr child to
                    sone…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…And rise vp on þe laste day& wend to blis þat
                    lastiþ ay
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
narracio de filio dimitis sancto monacho inuita patre qui videbat
                        iuuenes mori sicut & senes (p. 364)
